channel.title: How do I upload my client folder?
channel.description:
I don't know how to upload a actually folder to Uppit or Megaupload. Can you help me? I tried the Multiupload but it only alows 100 files max, so I am badly stuck. Please reply ASAP If you can help,
many thanks! ~Mod Kaii
